lines.gurmukhi: ljw kul AMksu Aau gur jn sIl fIl kulwbDU bRq kY piqbRq khwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Lajaa Kul Ankasu Au Gur Jan Seel Deela , Kulaabadhoo Brat Kai Patibrat Kahaavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Because of the good of the family honour, displaying calm and tranquil behaviour before the elders of the house and following the right ethos expected of a married woman, a daughter-in-law of a good family is called faithful and virtuous.

lines.gurmukhi: dust sBw sMjog ADm AswD sMgu bhu ibibcwr Dwir gnkw bulwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Dousat Sabhaa Sanjog Adham Asaadh Sangu , Bahu Bibichaar Dhaari Ganakaa Bulaavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: A woman who keeps company of evil people, doing acts highly condemnable and indulging in licentious deeds is called a whore.

lines.gurmukhi: kulwbDU suq ko bKwnIAq goqRwcwr ginkw suAwn ipqw nwmu ko bqwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Kulaabadhoo Sout Ko Bakhaaneeat Gotraachaara , Ganikaa Suaan Pitaa Naamu Ko Bataavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The son of a virtuous woman furthers the family lineage but who can tell the name of the father of a whore's son.

lines.gurmukhi: durmiq lwig jYsy kwgu bn bn iPrY gurmiq hMs eyk tyk jsu BwveI ]164]
lines.transliteration_english: Duramati Laagi Jaisay Kaagu Ban Ban Dhirai , Gurmati Hans Ayk Tayk Jasu Bhaavaee ?164?

Shabad OS B.translation: As a self-willed person of crow-like temperament wanders all over, a Guru-oriented person of swan-like attitude enjoys respect by taking the refuge of Lords name as taught and initiated to him by his Guru. (164)
